CORRECTION
Correction to: Joint failure recovery for snake robot locomotion using a shape‑based approach
Belal A. Elsayed1 · Tatsuya Takemori1 · Fumitoshi Matsuno1
Published online: 17 January 2023 © International Society of Artificial Life and Robotics (ISAROB) 2023
Cor rection to: Artifcial Life and Robotics (2022) 27:341–354 https://doi.org/10.1007/s10015-022-00742-1
1 Conclusion
I. In the above article [1], there is a typing error in equation (1), which has to be
where Sa = sin(a) and Ca = cos(a). This also applies to the equation format in the Appendix A, where the following terms have to be defined as
and

Including and is not needed as they contradict with the definition of ?̇?d . Notice that the final form of equation (11) does not change where
The above form is the finally applied control law that insures convergence of the recovery part’s tip-link.

1. Elsayed BA, Takemori T, Matsuno F (2022) Joint failure recovery for snake robot locomotion using a shape-based approach. Artif Life Robot 27(2):341–354
